works.description:
Is an article about the Ear Candy software.
The infinger copy pasted large part of the original work, removing any link
to my site, making it appear as written by him.
What worries me:
- the original work was copied for the most part (not just a fair use,
little part)
- ithe original work has been modified to make it appear that himself was
the author (he added a source link at the bottom, but that is simply not
enough)
- essential parts are removed (such as needed section) which nullifies my
writing intent
